# Assets Folder

Drop your images here!

## Folder Structure

- **products/** - Product images
- **blogs/** - Blog images
- **banners/** - Banner and hero images
- **icons/** - Icons and logos

## Usage

Just drag and drop your images into the appropriate folder, then reference them in your code:

```jsx
<img src="/assets/products/my-image.jpg" alt="Product" />
```
